card.title: Restore Progress
card.text: I have found your previous saved progress.

voice.intro: I have found your previous saved progress.
voice.prompt: To continue from where you left off, say "Resume". Otherwise, say "Restart".

voice.intro: My apologies, please repeat your command.

card.title: Help
card.text: I understand you need some help. At any time you can issue the following commands. To hear your options again, say "repeat options." To hear the entire scene again, say "repeat scene." In order to revisit the previous scene, say "go back." To start the game over, say "start again." At any time, to hear these commands again, say "help".

voice.intro: I understand you need some help. At any time you can issue the following commands. To hear your options again, say "repeat options." To hear the entire scene again, say "repeat scene." In order to revisit the previous scene, say "go back." To start the game over, say "start again." At any time, to hear these commands again, say "help".
voice.prompt: Now, what would you like to do?
